duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct legal research and analysis for family law cases
Appear in court for hearings, trials, and other legal proceedings
Draft pleadings, discovery, correspondence, and court orders
Provide sound legal advice in family law matters
Negotiate on behalf of clients and communicate legal positions effectively
Maintain strong organizational skills in managing case-related tasks

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution and a JD from an accredited law school
Admission to the North Carolina Bar Association
